txt.en: A sufficient number of Orcs have been defeated.
Some of the White Hand Orcs that attacked Scylfig have established an encampment to the north-west of Scylfig.
White Hand Orcs can be found around the area where Thrymm was thrown by Núrzum.
White Hand Orcs can be found around the area where Thrymm was thrown by Núrzum.\n\nYou should defeat White Hand Orcs.
You have defeated a number of marauding Orcs in the Writhendowns, avenging the dead in Scylfig.
Some of the White Hand Orcs that attacked Scylfig have established an encampment to the north-west of Scylfig.\n\nThis is as good an opportunity as any for revenge.
You have defeated a number of marauding Orcs in the Writhendowns, avenging the dead in Scylfig.
